name: The Hair Oil
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Oil
about: What it is: A lightweight, five-ingredient hair oil for all hair types that provides deep hydration, adds shine, and smooths and strengthens strands to create the healthiest hair...Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Concerns:.- Dryness - Frizz - Shine..Key Benefits:.- Deeply nourishes and hydrates.- Prevents frizz and flyaways.- Strengthens and softens strands..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Tsubaki Seed Oil: Deeply moisturizes, adds shine, and strengthens strands without weight..- Meadowfoam Seed Oil: A heat protectant and emollient that softens and hydrates hair...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Formulated with smoothing Japanese tsubaki seed and hydrating meadowfoam seed oil, this near-weightless serum deeply hydrates from within, protects strands from heat and exposure, and reduces unwanted frizz and the appearance of split ends and flyaways...Fragrance Description: Crown Affairs signature fragrance combines bergamot, yuzu, and lemongrass for a cool, light scent...
ingredients: -Tsubaki Seed Oil: Deeply moisturizes, adds shine, and strengthens strands without weight..-Meadowfoam Seed Oil: A heat protectant and emollient that softens and hydrates hair...Dimethicone, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Camellia Japonica (Tsubaki) Seed Oil, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Fragrance/Parfum...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply The Oil to your fingertips.-Work it into damp or dry hair from mid-lengths to ends. Use before heat styling for extra protection.
